name: tessel-gpio-relay
description: JavaScript driver for Tessel, to connect with multi-port relays via GPIO

scripts.local: npm run build; export NODE_NOT_TESSEL=1 ; node test.js
scripts.device: npm run build && npm run t2:run
scripts.test: npm run build && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --ui tdd test/*

author: nec@shell8.net
